K12D0722_H0714:483a-0: @483a 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid bzhin
K12D0722_H0714:483a-1: gyi nor bu'i rtog pa las smon lam 'byung ba
K12D0722_H0714:483a-2: / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
K12D0722_H0714:483a-3: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag
K12D0722_H0714:483a-4: / 'tshal lo // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0722_H0714:483a-5: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0722_H0714:483a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje
K12D0722_H0714:483a-7: chen po dang ldan pa mthu chen thob la phyag
K12D0722_H0714:483a-8: 'tshal lo // btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
K12D0722_H0714:483a-9: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol
K12D0722_H0714:483a-10: 'tshal lo // / 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang /
K12D0722_H0714:483a-11: mtshan nas brjod pas bdag dang sems can thams cad
K12D0722_H0714:483a-12: kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa thams cad zhi zhing
K12D0722_H0714:483b-0: btsun pa spyan @483b ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0722_H0714:483b-1: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas /
K12D0722_H0714:483b-2: bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang gnod pa dang /
K12D0722_H0714:483b-3: phyir rgol ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig /
K12D0722_H0714:483b-4: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0722_H0714:483b-5: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas /
K12D0722_H0714:483b-6: bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /
K12D0722_H0714:483b-8: bdud kyi las skyes pa thams cad byang zhing grol bar gyur cig /
K12D0722_H0714:483b-9: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0722_H0714:483b-10: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas /
K12D0722_H0714:483b-11: bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis btsun pa spyan
K12D0722_H0714:483b-12: ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal rtag tu mthong zhing smon
K12D0722_H0714:483b-13: lam ji skad btab pa thams cad kyang myur du
K12D0722_H0714:483b-15: btsun pa spyan ras dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0722_H0714:483b-16: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag
K12D0722_H0714:483b-17: gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas
K12D0722_H0714:483b-18: / bdag dang sems can thams cad 'phags pa gang
K12D0722_H0714:483b-19: dag zhal mngon sum du lta zhing dam pa mchog
K12D0722_H0714:483b-20: gsol ba thams cad kyang de bzhin du grub par
K12D0722_H0714:484a-1: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0722_H0714:484a-2: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su
K12D0722_H0714:484a-3: dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas; bdag dang sems
K12D0722_H0714:484a-4: can thams cad kyi 'jig rten dag na phongs shing
K12D0722_H0714:484a-5: nyam thag pa thams cad la phan pa dang /
K12D0722_H0714:484a-6: bde bar bgyid pa la mthu chen po thob par gyur cig /
K12D0722_H0714:484a-7: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0722_H0714:484a-8: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas /
K12D0722_H0714:484a-9: 'jig rten dag na mu ge'i dgon pa chen po dang /
K12D0722_H0714:484a-12: rlung la sogs pa'i gnod pa gang dag byung bas
K12D0722_H0714:484a-13: skye bo mang po nyam thag pa de dag zhi
K12D0722_H0714:484a-14: ba dang / ma mchis par bgyid par gyur cig /
K12D0722_H0714:484a-15: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0722_H0714:484a-16: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas /
K12D0722_H0714:484a-17: bdag dang sems can gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas
K12D0722_H0714:484a-18: pha rol tu 'chi 'pho ba'i 'jigs pa chen po
K12D0722_H0714:484a-19: nye bar gnas pa na yang /
K12D0722_H0714:484a-20: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug khyod zhal mngon sum
K12D0722_H0714:484a-21: du mthong zhing dbugs 'byin pa chen po mdzad par
K12D0722_H0714:484a-22: gyur cig / bdag dang sems can gzhan 'chi 'pho
K12D0722_H0714:484a-23: ba dag gis kyang nyon mongs pa dag gis ma
K12D0722_H0714:484a-24: spros pa chos bdag med pa dran pa dang ldan
K12D0722_H0714:484b-0: gyur cig / pa / byang chub kyi sems tshad med @484b par brtan pa /
K12D0722_H0714:484b-2: spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan zhing /
K12D0722_H0714:484b-3: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad nye bar zhi zhing /
K12D0722_H0714:484b-4: dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhin du 'chi 'pho bar gyur cig /
K12D0722_H0714:484b-5: tshe rabs thams cad du yang 'phags pa spyan ras
K12D0722_H0714:484b-6: gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du skye zhing tshe
K12D0722_H0714:484b-7: rabs rjes su dran pa dang /
K12D0722_H0714:484b-8: byang chub kyi sems kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K12D0722_H0714:484b-10: 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug la sogs pa mnyes par bgyid cing /
K12D0722_H0714:484b-11: ji skad bstan pa bzhin du grub pa'i mthu dang ldan par gyur cig /
K12D0722_H0714:484b-12: ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug des thugs rje chen
K12D0722_H0714:484b-13: po'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo lhun gyis grub pa
K12D0722_H0714:484b-14: dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje dang ro gcig par gyur cig /
K12D0722_H0714:484b-15: ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug gis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /
K12D0722_H0714:484b-16: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /
K12D0722_H0714:484b-17: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
K12D0722_H0714:484b-18: 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams
K12D0722_H0714:484b-19: cad kyis kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin
K12D0722_H0714:484b-21: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag pa dang /
K12D0722_H0714:484b-22: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par gyur cig /
K12D0722_H0714:484b-23: ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0722_H0714:484b-24: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs rje'i bdag
K12D0722_H0714:484b-25: nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rjes su
K12D0722_H0714:484b-26: dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas /
K12D0722_H0714:484b-27: dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams
K12D0722_H0714:484b-28: cad kyi mtshan nas brjod cing bsnyen bkur bgyis par
K12D0722_H0714:485a-1: ji ltar dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas
K12D0722_H0714:485a-2: pa thams cad kyi thugs rje'i rang bzhin 'phags pa
K12D0722_H0714:485a-3: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de rjes su dran pa
K12D0722_H0714:485a-4: dang mtshan nas brjod cing mchod pa bgyis pas /
K12D0722_H0714:485a-5: thugs rje chen po'i yul du gyur pa sems can
K12D0722_H0714:485a-6: thams cad la yang snying rje chen por thabs kyi
K12D0722_H0714:485a-7: sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar gyur cig
K12D0722_H0714:485a-8: / ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe //
K12D0722_H0714:485a-9: de snyed bdag ni lus skyes par //
K12D0722_H0714:485a-10: de srid mgon po mchod bgyid cing //
K12D0722_H0714:485a-11: de snyed lus sbyor tshogs bgyid shog /
K12D0722_H0714:485a-12: ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe //
K12D0722_H0714:485a-13: ji skad bdag gis ngag skyes par //
K12D0722_H0714:485a-14: de srid mgon po'i mtshan brjod cing //
K12D0722_H0714:485a-15: dag gi sbyor ba tshogs bgyid shog /
K12D0722_H0714:485a-16: ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba na //
K12D0722_H0714:485a-17: de snyed bdag gi yid 'byung ba //
K12D0722_H0714:485a-18: de snyed mgon po rjes dran zhing //
K12D0722_H0714:485a-19: yid sbyor tshogs par bgyid gyur cig /
K12D0722_H0714:485a-20: de ltar lus dang ngag yid kyis //
K12D0722_H0714:485a-21: thugs rje'i dbang phyug rten bgyis bas //
K12D0722_H0714:485a-22: lus dang ngag yid skyon bral zhing //
K12D0722_H0714:485a-23: yon tan phun sum tshogs gyur cig /
K12D0722_H0714:485a-24: de ltar lus ngag yid kyis su //
K12D0722_H0714:485a-25: thugs rje'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs //
K12D0722_H0714:485a-26: rtag tu sbyor bar bgyis pas na //
K12D0722_H0714:485a-27: thugs rje'i dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs //
K12D0722_H0714:485a-28: srid gsum re ba'i gnas gcig po //
K12D0722_H0714:485a-29: yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
K12D0722_H0714:485a-30: de 'drar bdag kyang grub gyur te //
K12D0722_H0714:485a-31: srid gsum re rdzogs bgyid gyur cig /
K12D0722_H0714:485a-32: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0722_H0714:485a-33: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0722_H0714:485a-36: mah'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12D0722_H0714:485b-2: tsint'a ma ni mah'a padme ru ru tishtha /
K12D0722_H0714:485b-3: dzva la a'a karsha ya h'um phata sv'ah'a /
K12D0722_H0714:485b-5: aom padme tsint'a ma ni dzva la h'um/
K12D0722_H0714:485b-7: aom bha ra ta padme h'um/
K12D0722_H0714:485b-9: aom na ni badzre ni h'um/
